Description of incident: "We recently became aware of a computer intrusion that affected checkout systems at a number of San Antonio Shoemakers stores located in the United States. Promptly after discovering the issue, we engaged outside cybersecurity experts to conduct an extensive investigation. We have been working closely with law enforcement authorities andcoordinating our efforts with the payment card organizations to determine the facts. Upon the written request of the United States Attorney’s Office for the Southern District of New York and the New York Electronic Crimes Task Force of the United States Secret Service we delayed notifying individuals potentially affected by this incident for 30 days while lawenforcement began their investigation."More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-62930
